entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 21.

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Sunday 12 March 2023
